actions.name: Intoxicate

cost.trigger: The user declares a Normal-Type attack

actions.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Normal-Type attack
Effect: The user increases the Power of the triggering attack by 20% and changes its Type to Poison-Type until the end of their current Activation.

system.description:
Trigger: The user declares a Normal-Type attack
Effect: The user increases the Power of the triggering attack by 20% and changes its Type to Poison-Type until the end of their current Activation.
